item.title: Apollonia, Co-Star of ‘Purple Rain,’ Sues Prince Estate Over Ownership of Stage Name
item.description: Apollonia, best known as a singer-actor-model and Prince protege who co-starred in the 1984 film “Purple Rain,” has taken the late singer’s estate to court over its attempts to cance
